channel.title: Graphics?
channel.description: Ok so for runescape , I thought, wouldn't it be cool if you could choose from original graphics like in a 317, or the GAY graphics now a days when playing.this way people can enjoy the old graphics (non laggy in my case) and not have to stare at a gay guy swaying all day long. And for the people who enjoy the graphics, they can play in the HD or "new" graphics they are either used to or enjoy much more. Just an opinion, I mean, would it be too hard to put a button on the screen for graphics giving you the option of choosing an older version? Discuss? Thanks.

item.title: Graphics?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:12, topic:402435”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=499491.msg3653541#msg3653541 date=1309887076]
The graphics are a lot better now. You just had better gameplay experiences back in the day.
[/quote]
Na, back in the day you couldn’t barrage people for free like you can in SC.[/quote]
Speaking of barrage, I love the old gfx for it. It was litterly just a solid cube of ice.

Read full topic

item.title: Graphics?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:4, topic:402435”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=499491.msg3653084#msg3653084 date=1309853269]
Play a private server.

Jagex won’t revert to the good times. No point in whining about it.

/thread
[/quote]

Unfortunately you’re probably correct… Why did they have to fuck up the game so badly.[/quote]
It’s called progress. In my opinion RuneScape is better then classic now, they brought back the wildy and free trade thats all they needed so everything they make now is icing on the cake.

Read full topic

but if its members theyll do it for sure becuz dey luv der moniez hurrr
